document.full_text: bill gross, manager of top bond fund pimco, said on monday it was a "misconception" that the firm was betting against u.s. treasuries, despite his concerns about the u.s. fiscal outlook.
document.title: gross says pimco "never" short treasuries: report
lines_and_colors: bill gross, manager of top bond fund pimco, said on monday it was a "misconception" that the firm was betting against u.s. treasuries, despite his concerns about the u.s. fiscal outlook.
